__mocks__ - sample data used for unit tests
agents-system - Python agents framework with runners and utilities
codefetch - script to download external repo snippets
designs - design assets and diagrams for UI components
development-modes - shell scripts for switching project modes
docs - extensive markdown documentation and guides
mcp-servers - TypeScript microservers implementing Model Context Protocol
models - shared TypeScript types for reports
node_modules - third-party packages (generated)
out - compiled JS output from TypeScript
prompt-engineering - prompt templates and examples
scripts - helper scripts for environment and setup
src - main TypeScript extension and server code
startup - bootstrap scripts and environment checks
t2p - CLI tool for todo and research workflows
templates - text templates for prompts and reports
test-agents - experiments for agent behaviors
test - jest unit tests
tools - misc tooling (cleanup, text processing)
